description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. PyroManic - Solo is a fast paced arcade style “twitch” action game that challenges the players' hand-eye co-ordination and reaction skills. How long can you survive?!!
description.short: PyroManic - Solo is a fast paced arcade style “twitch” action game that challenges the players' hand-eye co-ordination and reaction skills. How long can you survive?!!
